Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 16 Micchattaniyatattika » 16.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 16.5.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 16.5.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Napurejātādi
Micchattaniyatattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Napurejātādi
31.
2329Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  arūpe sammattaniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (1)
2330Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  arūpe aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2331Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā. (Paripuṇṇaṃ.)
